option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --config configs/edit-ctn.yaml --train --gpu 0 trainer.max_steps=1600 system.cache_dir="black_bike" system.seg_prompt="bike" system.prompt_processor.prompt="make the bike black" system.max_densify_percent=0.0025 system.anchor_weight_init_g0=1 system.anchor_weight_init=0.5 system.anchor_weight_multiplier=1.5 system.loss.lambda_anchor_color=0 system.loss.lambda_anchor_geo=5 system.loss.lambda_anchor_scale=5 system.loss.lambda_anchor_opacity=0 system.densify_from_iter=100 system.densify_until_iter=5000 system.densification_interval=300 data.source=gs_data/360/bicycle system.gs_source=gs_data/trained_gs_models/bicycle/point_cloud/iteration_7000/point_cloud.ply system.loggers.wandb.enable=true system.loggers.wandb.name="edit_ctn_bike_black"
